location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from A A Constantine, Bushire to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter concerns a bill for mares and a packet shipped to India on board the Ahmed Shah,lost at sea, which has been refused by the Governor of Bombay. It includes a request that the case for the bill's acceptance, outlined in the letter, should be represented to the Governor by the Resident.
